official_title: A bill to provide for the minting and issuance of one-dollar coins bearing the likeness of Susan B.  Anthony.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to mint and issue one dollar coins bearing the likeness of Susan B. Anthony.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the minting and issuance of one-dollar coins bearing the likeness of Susan B.  Anthony.
